short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: VeryboxWallet is batch sign wallet,users can sign tx with it on some website,and keep private in safe.
short.zh_CN: VeryboxWallet 是一个批量钱包插件！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Product feature:
1.keep private in your chrome extension,your private key not touch with the site your visit
2.sign tx(not send tx)
It's open-source soft,code opened on github.
